SELECT qz_seq as qzSeq, img_grp_id as imgGrpId, qz_nm as qzNm, st_dt as stDt, end_dt as endDt, psh_yn as pshYn, dsp_yn as dspYn, mx_prt as mxPrt, reg_dt as regDt, mod_dt as modDt, view_cnt as viewCnt, use_yn as useYn FROM internsc.tb_qz WHERE 1=1
AND reg_dt = #{regDt}
AND st_dt >= to_timestamp(#{stDt}||' 00:00:00.000','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND end_dt <= to_timestamp(#{endDt}||' 23:59:59.999','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND dsp_yn = #{dspYn}
AND qz_nm LIKE '%' || #{qzNm} || '%'
ORDER BY reg_dt
ORDER BY st_dt

SELECT qz_seq as qzSeq, img_grp_id as imgGrpId, qz_nm as qzNm, st_dt as stDt, end_dt as endDt, psh_yn as pshYn, dsp_yn as dspYn, mx_prt as mxPrt, reg_dt as regDt, mod_dt as modDt, view_cnt as viewCnt, use_yn as useYn FROM internsc.tb_qz WHERE 1=1
AND reg_dt BETWEEN to_timestamp(#{stDt}||' 00:00:00.000','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_timestamp(#{endDt}||' 23:59:59.999','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

AND dsp_yn = #{dspYn}
AND qz_nm LIKE '%' || #{qzNm} || '%'
ORDER BY reg_dt DESC
ORDER BY st_dt DESC
LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{startList}
